law.catch_line: Approval Of Application For Tax Exemption For Housing Development Project Under Sec. 59 Of Chapter 59
law.text: [Text of section applicable as provided by 2010, 240, Sec. 199. See 2010, 240, Sec. 195.] Under section 5M of chapter 59, the department may approve a municipalityâ€™s application for a tax exemption for a housing development project located within an approved housing development zone.
